name: Unity Standard Assets (4.6) Remastered
description:
The old and gold Standard Assets from Unity 4.6 in good graphics!

This is a demo showcasing the features of Unity 2019. Using the old Unity 4.6 Standard Assets and improving their graphics to a very high quality

Features

Realistic Motion blur,bloom and color grading

PBR Materials and lightning

Ambient oclusion

Screen Space Reflections and Realtime Reflection Probes

Notes

Due to incompatibilities with Unity 4.6 to Unity 2019.x, only 6 demos are playeable(1 with some physics iusses)

Press 1-5 number keys to change the demos
